channel.title: Thanet Walking Festival News
channel.description: The Latest News from the Thanet Walking Festival

item.title: Another successful year
item.description: Many thanks to all who took part in this year's festival!

item.title: Thanet Walking Festival 2012
item.description:
Preparation is well under way, details of the program mere available on the Festival Programme page.
Check back here as the festival nears for more details.

item.title: Turner Contemporary Event
item.description:
Late Night Live: Landmark
20 April 6-10pm
Artist Hamish Fulton will be leading a group walk as part of this evening event at Turner Contemporary, in celebration of Turner Contemporaryâ€™s 1st birthday.
To take part in the walk email sangiama@turnercontemporary.org.
